name: Symphonica
tagline: A simple Windows Phone Game created on the XNA Game Studio 4.0 platform using Visual C#, the app is a digital, touch-screen piano with a single octave. Deployable on devices or emulators with Windows Phone OS 7.1 or higher.
body:
Symphonica
==========

A simple Windows Phone Game created on the XNA Game Studio 4.0 platform using Visual C#, the app is a digital, touch-screen piano with a single octave. Deployable on devices or emulators with Windows Phone OS 7.1 or higher.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
